name: Dead Meat in the Pit
description:
A text adventure based on the Brothers Grimm's story "Going A-Travelling". A simple young peasant goes on a journey to see the world, while obeying their mother's advice not to say too much. Can be solved by using solely compass directions and the "TALK" command. Short and easy, but contains multiple endings.

Can also be played online here.

A walkthrough can be found here.
